general_info.summary: This document outlines information regarding visa fees and the Foreigners Act, mentioning an online portal for visa applications. It states that Indian Missions/Posts require a minimum of three working days to process visa applications upon receipt, with processing time varying based on nationality and excluding special cases.
general_info.raw_content:
• Visa Fee
• Foreigners Act
Online Portal for Visa
Upon receipt of the Visa Application through Indian Visa Application Center or directly, the Indian Mission/ Post requires a minimum of three working days to process the case and issue a visa depending upon the nationality and excluding special cases.
